text: "'I Just Called to Say I Love You" is a 1984 song by Stevie Wonder. It was taken from the soundtrack to the 1984 movie The Woman in Red. It topped the single charts in 19 countries including the United States and the United Kingdom. It won an Academy Award. It was nominated for 3 Grammy Awards in 1985. "I Just Called to Say I Love You" remains Wonder's most successful single to date. It also remains Wonder's only No. 1 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Stevie Wonder songs Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songs
title: I Just Called to Say I Love You
